00020 /**
00021  * @file   SocketUtil.h
00022  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00023  * @date   Mon Jan 25 11:29:11 2010
00024  * 
00025  * @brief  Some utilities for dealing with reading and writing to sockets.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #ifndef SOCKETUTIL_H
00029 #define SOCKETUTIL_H
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 
00033 #ifdef WIN32
00034 #define CLOSE_SOCKET closesocket
00035 #else
00036 #define CLOSE_SOCKET close
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 /**
00040  * Class with static utility functions for working with Sockets.
00041  * 
00042  */
00043 class SocketUtil {
00044 
00045 public: 
00046 
00047   /** 
00048    * Send a message over multiple socket send calls as necessary
00049    * 
00050    * @param socket - Socket to write to
00051    * @param buf - Buffer to send over socket
00052    * @param toSend - How long is buffer
00053    * @param sent - Number characters actually sent
00054    * 
00055    * @return 
00056    */
00057   virtual int sendAll(int socket, const char *buf, int toSend, int &sent);
00058 
00059   /** 
00060    * Tokenize the buffer into distinct messages
00061    * 
00062    * @param buffer - String to break into individual messages
00063    * @param messages - Vector of messages to fill in 
00064    */
00065   virtual void parseMsgFromBuffer(std::string &buffer, std::vector<std::string> &messages);
00066 
00067   /** 
00068    * Try to read new messages from socket.
00069    * 
00070    * @param messages - Vector to fill with char * messages from socket.
00071    * @param socket - socket to read messages from. Set to -1 if disconnected.
00072    */
00073   virtual void checkForMsgs(std::vector<std::string> &messages, int &socket);
00074 
00075   /** 
00076    * Write char * messages into a socket.
00077    * 
00078    * @param msg - Message to write to the socket.
00079    * @param socket - Socket that could be written to.
00080    */
00081   virtual void sendMsg(const std::string &msg, int &socket);
00082 
00083 protected:
00084 
00085   /// Data coming over socket, including any partial messages
00086   std::string m_Buffer;
00087 
00088 };
00089 
00090 #endif /* SOCKETUTIL_H */
